channel.title: Bhopal News on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Bhopal News on NewsStreet

item.title: Chhindwara: Desh Jodo Yatra can be taken out in India only, says Kamal Nath
item.description: Chhindwara: Desh Jodo Yatra can be taken out in India only, says Kamal Nath Kamal Nath at Gandhi Chaupal in Chhindwara district on TuesdayBhopal (Madhya Pradesh): In place of giving importance to diversity of culture in India, some people indulge in narrow politics.

item.title: Bhind: Woman dies in stampede during religious discourse at village temple
item.description: Bhind: Woman dies in stampede during religious discourse at village temple Bhopal (Madhya Pradesh): An elderly woman died in a stampede during a religious discourse event organised at a temple in village Dadraua of Bhind district on Tuesday, said the officials.
